snippet: China’s decision to cut its interest rates for the second time in a month caused investors to worry that the downturn in the world’s second-largest economy may be worse than previously expected.
abstract: Stocks close mostly lower after signs emerge that Americans are spending at a slower pace and that China's economy may be in worse shape than previously thought.
lead_paragraph: China’s decision to cut its interest rates for the second time in a month caused investors to worry that the downturn in the world’s second-largest economy may be worse than previously expected.

headline.seo: Shares Fall on Reports of Weak Retail Sales
headline.main: Shares Fall on Reports of Weak Retail Sales
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on Reports of Weak Retail Sales
